title: The One Where They Were Supposed to Get Married
description:
Lala and Rand are apart and podcasting on what’s supposed to have been their Wedding Day, April 18th! Lala’s quarantined in St. George, Utah and Randall’s locked down in their LA home. They talk about their cancelled wedding, Lala’s sobriety and how the passing of her beloved dad has been affecting her life the last couple of years. They also address Lala’s Vanderpump Rules after-show comments, the “newbies,” her relationship with Scheana Shay, the Bro Code, and their favorite movies and TV shows. Plus, Randall turns the interview table on Lala, and does his best Lala Kent sign-off at the end of the show!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
